disableRenderInPause.title: Disable rendering in pause
disableRenderInPause.tooltip: Disables cameras when the game is paused. Use this to save resources in windowed mode

enableProgressUI.title: Enable recording progress UI
enableProgressUI.tooltip: Enable this to see last recorded frame in the game window. Can affect performance

apiPort.title: Web API port
apiPort.tooltip: Port number that the mod will use to host it's HTTP API

ffmpegPath.title: FFmpeg executable path
ffmpegPath.tooltip: By default FFmpeg is found in PATH

enableApiInfoLogs.title: Log Web API info
enableApiInfoLogs.tooltip: Enable this to see Info logs for each HTTP request. Warnings and errors are always logged

enableFFmpegLogs.title: Log FFmpeg output
enableFFmpegLogs.tooltip: FFmpeg is required to record mp4 files from cameras. Enable this to see FFmpeg logs
